title: Dopant-free fluorene based dimers linked with thiophene units as prospective hole transport materials for Sb2S3 solar cells
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00472H, Paper

Nimish Juneja, Aistė Jegorovė, Raitis Grzibovskis, Atanas Katerski, Maryte Daskeviciene, Tadas Malinauskas, Aivars Vembris, Smagul Karazhanov, Nicolae Spalatu, Vytautas Getautis, Malle Krunks, Ilona Oja Acik
Novel dopant-free dimers comprising methoxydiphenylamine substituted fluorene derivatives as hole transport materials (HTMs) in Sb2S3 absorber solar cells.
